title: BOBO&TOTO
synopsis: This animated short film tells about a warm and bumpy rescue journey between a pair of good friends, the fat panda BoBo and the cock ToTo. ToTo accidentally ate a poisoned apple and was unconscious, and ToTo, who was weak on BoBo's back, hit the road. Along the way, they met the frog princess who jumped off the cliff and the sword practice boy who was sent to the cross. When they came to the tramway station, they faced the terrifying death Gobi. After several obstacles, they finally came to the strange Qilinyu Town. However, he was poisoned by the evil rat race. The dying ToTo was dying. Thanks to the fairy guiding them to take a flying machine to the unicorn island in the middle of the sea, to find the prince riding a pig and holding a wooden sword to detoxify. Can ToTo escape the danger and live a happy life with BoBo again? 　　Bigantian’s animated short film "Swallowtail Butterfly" was screened on CCTV-6 movie channel "Love Painting Movie", with a total of four scenes: belladonna, unicorn fish, rootless water and swallowtail butterfly (translated from douban)
